summary.title: Telemetry API Now Generally Available
summary.summary: The Telemetry API has reached general availability, offering enhanced integration capabilities.

2025-09-23.content:
[General availability](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) support for the following integration:

* [Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka](https://cloud.google.com/vpc-service-controls/docs/supported-products#table_managed_kafka)

summary.title: Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka is now generally available
summary.summary: The Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka is now generally available, offering a fully managed Kafka experience on Google Cloud.

2025-08-18.content:

summary.title: Secure Web Proxy Integration Now Generally Available
summary.summary: We are pleased to announce the general availability of our Secure Web Proxy integration. This feature enhances your security by providing robust proxy capabilities.

summary.title: License Manager Now Generally Available
summary.summary: License Manager is now generally available, offering enhanced integration capabilities. This feature aims to streamline license management processes.

2025-08-04.content:
[General availability](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) support for the following integration:

* [Backup for GKE](https://cloud.google.com/vpc-service-controls/docs/supported-products#table_gkebackup)

summary.title: Backup for GKE Now Available
summary.summary: Backup for GKE is now generally available.

2025-07-31.content:
**VPC Service Controls feature:** The VPC Service Controls violation dashboard is [generally available](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages). This dashboard provides an aggregated view of all access denials by service perimeters in your organization.

* The following charts are added to the dashboard:
  + Violation count
  + Top violations by access policy
* While creating a new log bucket during the dashboard setup, you can now select the region and retention period.

For more information, see [Set up and view the violation dashboard](https://cloud.google.com/vpc-service-controls/docs/violation-dashboard).

summary.title: VPC Service Controls Violation Dashboard
summary.summary: VPC Service Controls violation dashboard now generally available.

summary.title: Preview release of License Manager integration
summary.summary: License Manager support is now in Preview.

* [Places (New) API](https://cloud.google.com/vpc-service-controls/docs/supported-products#table_places_new)

summary.title: Preview Support for Address Validation and Places APIs
summary.summary: We are introducing preview support for Address Validation API and Places (New) API, enhancing your ability to manage security policies for these services.
